title: Pentatonix’s Version Of John Lennon’s Classic ‘Imagine’ Is Touching Everyone’s Hearts
text:
Pentatonix’s Version Of John Lennon’s Classic ‘Imagine’ Is Touching Everyone’s Hearts   
John Lennon’s song “Imagine” is as relevant now as it was when he first wrote it back in 1971. The song’s lyrics imagine a world with peace, where people of all walks of life, races and religions come together to make the world a better place. 
The classic song has been covered many times, and this time the singers of the popular acapella group, Pentatonix, lend their harmonious voices to the tune and shares Lennon’s universal message. 
Their latest album that includes this song is available for pre-order on Amazon here .
